segments.text: This kitchen drawing shows a typical day gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is completely oblivious to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just keeps flowing out, unchecked and wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see the damage starting to the woodwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking everything for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, not realizing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the mom; she'll be heartbroken if they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or if she steps in the puddle and slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden, so contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights how fragile normalcy can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies might not be worth the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, caught in this moment of unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
